footer.description: Make AI prompt management simpler and more efficient. Build your exclusive prompt library and enhance AI conversation efficiency.

hero.subtitleStart: An open-source prompt management platform built for
hero.description: Supports version control, team collaboration, smart categorization, and more.

features.title: Powerful and Simple Features
features.description: Providing you with a one-stop prompt management solution

items.title: Smart Category Management
items.description: Organize prompts using tags, projects, etc., for quick retrieval.

items.title: Version Control
items.description: Record modification history, review or restore previous versions anytime.

items.title: Team Collaboration
items.description: Supports multi-person collaboration, fine-grained permission control, real-time updates.

items.title: AI Model Support
items.description: Supports any OpenAI compatible API model, provides a real-time testing environment.

items.title: Data Security
items.description: Enterprise-level data encryption, optional private deployment solution.

items.title: Prompt Optimization
items.description: Provides prompt optimization service, generate high-quality prompts with one click.

items.content: This is a very simple way to iterate and manage prompts.
items.author: IndieAI
items.title: AI Indie Developer

items.content: Prompt Minder is really great, simple but not simplistic.
items.author: Xiao Rui
items.title: Prompt Engineer

items.content: Prompt Minder creates a great debugging environment.
items.author: aircrushin
items.title: AI Enthusiast

items.question: How to start using Prompt Minder?
items.answer: Simply register an account to get started. We provide detailed tutorials and documentation to help you get started quickly.

items.question: Does it support team collaboration?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complete team collaboration features, including member management, permission control, real-time synchronization, etc.

items.question: How is data security ensured?
items.answer: We use enterprise-level encryption technology to protect your data and support data export and backup functions.

items.question: Is private deployment supported?
items.answer: Enterprise plan users can choose a private deployment solution, and we provide complete deployment support and technical services.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join Prompt Minder now and start your AI prompt management journey

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionContent: Welcome to our service. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy details how we collect, use, store, and protect your information. Please read the following carefully to understand our data processing practices.
collectionItems: Information you actively provide (e.g., registration info, profile details)
Information automatically collected when using the service (e.g., device info, log data)
Information from third parties (e.g., when you log in using a third-party account)
privacyPolicy.usageIntro: We use the collected information to:
usageItems: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacyPolicy.sharingIntro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
sharingItems: When required by law or for law enforcement purposes
privacyPolicy.securityIntro: We take various security measures to protect your personal information:
securityItems: Using encryption technology to protect data transmission
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide a better service experience. These technologies help us:
privacyPolicy.rightsIntro: Regarding your personal information, you have the right to:
rightsItems: Access and view your personal information
Object to or restrict information processing
privacyPolicy.updatesContent: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated policy will be posted on the website, and we will notify you of significant changes through appropriate means. Continued use of our services signifies your acceptance of the latest Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.contactIntro: If you have any questions or suggestions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceContent: Welcome to our service. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
serviceDescriptionItems: Creation, sharing, and use of AI prompts
Use of related resources and tools
termsOfService.userResponsibilitiesIntro: As a user, you agree to:
userResponsibilitiesItems: Protect account security and be responsible for account activities
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Respect the intellectual property rights of others
Not post illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyIntro: Ownership of content on the platform:
intellectualPropertyItems: The intellectual property rights of the platform content and services belong to us
Copyright of user-created content belongs to the user
Users grant the platform the right to use and display their content
Unauthorized copying or use of platform content is prohibited
serviceChangesItems: Modify or terminate any part of the service at any time
Suspend or terminate user accounts for violating terms
Restrict the use of certain features
termsOfService.disclaimerIntro: The service is provided "as is". We:
disclaimerItems: Do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free
Are not responsible for losses incurred by users
Are not responsible for third-party content
Reserve the right to change the service
disputeResolutionItems: Applicable law is the law of the People's Republic of China
Disputes shall be resolved through friendly negotiation
If negotiation fails, submit to court for adjudication
termsOfService.termsModificationContent: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. The updated terms will be posted on the website, and we will notify users of significant changes. Continued use of our service signifies your acceptance of the modified terms.
termsOfService.contactIntro: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

chatTest.sendMessageErrorDefault: Request failed, please check if the API Key is correct
chatTest.sendMessageErrorNetwork: Request failed, please check if the API Key is correct and the network connection is normal
chatTest.settingsTempTooltip: Controls the randomness and creativity of the output. Higher values make the output more creative but potentially less accurate; lower values make it more conservative and deterministic.
chatTest.settingsTokensTooltip: Limits the maximum length of the model's response. One token is approximately 0.75 Chinese characters or 1.5 English letters.
chatTest.settingsTopPTooltip: Controls the diversity of vocabulary choices. Higher values broaden the selection range; lower values make choices more conservative. Works better in conjunction with Temperature.
chatTest.settingsParamsDescription: Adjust these parameters to control the length and creativity of the AI's responses

tagsPage.title: Tag Management
tagsPage.noTagsMessage: No tags yet, click the top right corner to add a new tag
tagsPage.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This action cannot be undone.
